title: R package for Finna API
text: goal finna retrieve data Finna API

title: R package for Finna API
text: devel version FinnnaR can installed GitHub follows:
code: # Install finna if not already installed if (!requireNamespace("finna", quietly = TRUE)) {   remotes::install_github("rOpenGov/finna") } remotes::install_github("rOpenGov/finna")

title: R package for Finna API
text: basic functionality finna can explored follows: search related descending order
code: # Load the package library(finna) # Perform a simple search and print a table  record <- search_finna("sibelius") head(record) record <- search_finna("sibelius", sort = "main_date_str des") head(record)

Continuous code testing performed GitHub actions include R CMD check, Code coverage assessment possible thanks codecov. documentation website automatically updated thanks pkgdown. documentation formatted thanks devtools roxygen2.

title: R package for Finna API
text: package way officially related endorsed Finna. using data retrieved Finna database work, please indicate data source Finna. re-use involves kind modification data text, please state clearly end user. See Finna policy copyright free re-use data detailed information certain exceptions.

what: Get Finna Records by IDs with Extended Options — get_finna_records
title: Get Finna Records by IDs with Extended Options — get_finna_records
text: function retrieves multiple Finna records based vector record IDs. can specify fields return, language, pagination options.

title: Get Finna Records by IDs with Extended Options — get_finna_records
code: get_finna_records(   ids,   field = NULL,   prettyPrint = FALSE,   lng = "fi",   page = 1,   limit = 100 )

title: Get Finna Records by IDs with Extended Options — get_finna_records
text: ids vector record IDs retrieve. field vector fields return. Defaults NULL, returns default fields. prettyPrint Logical; whether pretty-print response. Defaults FALSE. lng Language returned translated strings. Defaults "fi". page page number retrieve. Defaults 1. limit number records return per page. Defaults 20.

title: Get Finna Records by IDs with Extended Options — get_finna_records
text: tibble containing retrieved records data provenance information.

title: Get Finna Records by IDs with Extended Options — get_finna_records
code: records <- get_finna_records("fikka.3405646", field = "title", prettyPrint = TRUE, lng = "en-gb") print(records) #> # A tibble: 1 × 10 #>   Title         Author Year  Language Formats Subjects Library Series provenance #>   <chr>         <chr>  <chr> <chr>    <chr>   <chr>    <chr>   <chr>  <chr>      #> 1 Uimaveden pu… NA     NA    NA       NA      NA       NA      NA     Finna API… #> # ℹ 1 more variable: data_license <chr>

what: Finna Index Search with Pagination and Advanced Options — search_finna
title: Finna Index Search with Pagination and Advanced Options — search_finna
text: function performs search Finna index extended options, allowing wide range search types, filters, facets, sorting methods. retrieves available data paginating API results.

title: Finna Index Search with Pagination and Advanced Options — search_finna
code: search_finna(   lookfor,   type = "AllFields",   fields = NULL,   filters = NULL,   facets = NULL,   facetFilters = NULL,   sort = "relevance,id asc",   limit = 100,   lng = "fi",   prettyPrint = FALSE )

title: Finna Index Search with Pagination and Advanced Options — search_finna
text: lookfor string containing search terms. Boolean operators (, , ) can included. type string specifying type search. Options include "AllFields", "Title", "Author", "Subject". Defaults "AllFields". fields vector fields returned search results. Defaults NULL, returns standard set fields. filters vector filter queries refine search. Defaults NULL. facets vector specifying facets return results. Defaults NULL. facetFilters vector regular expressions filter facets. Defaults NULL. sort string defining sort order results. Options include: "relevance,id asc" (default) "main_date_str desc" (Year, newest first) "main_date_str asc" (Year, oldest first) "last_indexed desc" (Last modified) "first_indexed desc" (Last added) "callnumber,id asc" (Classmark) "author,id asc" (Author) "title,id asc" (Title) limit integer specifying number records return per page. Defaults 100 (maximum). lng string language returned translated strings. Options "fi", "en-gb", "sv", "se". Defaults "fi". prettyPrint logical value indicating whether pretty-print JSON response. Useful debugging. Defaults FALSE.

title: Finna Index Search with Pagination and Advanced Options — search_finna
text: tibble containing search results relevant fields extracted provenance information.

title: Finna Index Search with Pagination and Advanced Options — search_finna
code: search_results <- search_finna("sibelius", sort = "main_date_str desc") #> Retrieved last page of results. #> Data retrieved from Finna API (https://www.finna.fi) - metadata licensed under CC0. print(search_results) #> # A tibble: 44,809 × 8 #>    Title                   Author Year  Language Formats Subjects Library Series #>    <chr>                   <chr>  <chr> <chr>    <chr>   <chr>    <chr>   <chr>  #>  1 He selvisivät sodasta   Kirve… 2024  fin      Kirja,… sotilaa… Anders… NA     #>  2 Yli-ihmisiä ja traagis… Frost… 2024  fin      Kirja,… Wagner,… Helka-… NA     #>  3 Eero Järnefelt          Järne… 2024  fin      Kirja,… Järnefe… Anders… Atene… #>  4 Eero Järnefelt          Järne… 2024  swe      Kirja,… Järnefe… Helle-… Atene… #>  5 Eero Järnefelt          Järne… 2024  eng      Kirja,… Järnefe… Helmet… Atene… #>  6 Solace                  NA     2024  zxx      Äänite… NA       Anders… NA     #>  7 Laulun juhlaa           Klas,… 2024  fin      Äänite… 2020-lu… Helmet… NA     #>  8 Solace                  Sibel… 2024  zxx      Äänite… NA       Taidey… NA     #>  9 A gardener's world : f… Fishe… 2024  eng      Äänite… NA       Anders… NA     #> 10 Sibelius, Prokofiev 1,… Janse… 2024  zxx      Äänite… NA       Eepos-… NA     #> # ℹ 44,799 more rows

title: finna (development version)
text: Initial CRAN submission.
